body:
The setup was pretty good and the characters meshed well so it's only more disappointing to see it end so abruptly, I wished the sex scene lasted like 4 more pages.
But overall very nice.

Pretty good feminization doujin :) I don't know why this has a rape tag though, it didn't really seems like he didn't want it, more that he was shy about it. Overall, pretty good doujin, and I like that the masculine characters are personified, compared to too many other works.

Since I'm still seeing some bitches posting the "curse within 5 years" stuff, I'll have to post this comment to stop the chain
-
If you're reading this comment you're immune to any curse in nhentai comment section. To apply this blessing, you simply have to read it. This blessing lasts forever and cannot be broken. Have a nice day!
I was wondering why production for the game took so long.

If you're into this genre, it's a pretty good one, short and simple but with a well enough story inside. It's a usual plot, and what they did with it is also decently generic, the contrast of having multiple characters with actual emotions instead of placeholders background ones is a well enough touch.


The art was good, and I enjoyed the line work. It was crisp, smooth, and most importantly, well detailed. Nothing was super exaggerated, but nothing pinned down, a good balance.

Overall? Good sweet spot for those getting into feminization and tomgirls.

Final rating? 7/10, not wild but not bad any means, good read.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga
So that's why they hired me
I feel like I'm reading something generated by an AI
Typical situation, been there before. 10/10 a little too relatable.
That's light novel title right there.
The censorship is a little rough but ultimately this made my gay cock happy so: recommended.
